title: VILLAGE ORB / spirit necktie
description: horrific necktie reacting to the bottle and urging you to buy it because otherwise buying the medicial spirit lacks foreshadowing and is too missable.

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "You stop mid-step and put your hand..."
dialogueTree.text: You stop mid-step and put your hand on the garish necktie.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "That bottle, *bratan*! Just look at..."
links.text: That bottle, *bratan*! Just look at that bottle!

links.title: Rosemary: "In this drunk's hand -- on the pipe..."
links.text: In this drunk's hand -- on the pipe there. Glowing blue, a mysterious, otherworldly blue. Filled to the brim with holy mysteries!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's hard to know what exactly your..."
links.text: It's hard to know what exactly your vivid interior is speaking of here, but I'm guessing it's got a lot of alcohol in it.

links.title: You: "I really don't care about any bottl..."
links.text: I really don't care about any bottle. I don't want to look at it.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "You *should* care. I'm getting a *v..."
links.text: You *should* care. I'm getting a *very* special vibe from that bottle. Please go talk to him. I need to look at it closer...

links.title: You: "Okay. Cool. What do I do next?"
links.text: Okay. Cool. What do I do next?

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Oh I think this is about so much *m..."
links.text: Oh I think this is about so much *more* than cool. Please go talk to him. See what it's about. I'm *drawn* to it.
